principles.title: Teamwork
principles.body: We firmly believe that together, we can achieve more. Working in teams allows us to pair program and do thorough code reviews to ensure that we are delivering cleaner and more reliable solutions faster than any one of us could on our own.

principles.title: Excellence
principles.body: Our members are hardworking, quick learning programmers and designers. We aim to excel at everything we do, whether it's the software we develop, the relationships we build with clients, or the culture we foster.

principles.title: Growth
principles.body: Students that join us become more experienced, discover their interests within computer science, and share their expertise with one another. We embrace each other's mistakes and find strength in asking each other for help.
